description:
This Bundle includes Food Truck Tycoon and Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine with all DLCs available. 

Test your skills and talent as owner of two busy food trucks, and see which kind of business is your favorite!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible. Be careful not to burn the food!

IN FOOD TRUCK TYCOONS 2 in 1 BUNDLE YOU WILL FIND:

• 200 levels to explore 
• Over 200 dishes to serve
• Great cartoonish graphics, music and sound effects
• Countless upgrades you can apply to ingredients and bar decorations
• 25 Achievements to complete
• Easy to play and hard to master

Go ahead, try it out! Fulfill your dream of becoming the tycoon of the best food trucks in the city!
name: Food Truck Tycoons - 2 in 1 Bundle
